title: Keyword Research
subtitle: Professional keyword research powered by AI for your books

list.title: Keyword Research Orders
list.emptyDescription: Order your first keyword research to get AI-powered keywords optimized for Amazon KDP.

new.subtitle: Get AI-powered keyword recommendations for your book

draft.restored: Draft restored from your previous session

bookId.label: Select Book

bookTitle.label: Book Title
bookTitle.description: The full title of your book

description.placeholder: A comprehensive guide for authors who want to self-publish...
description.description: Brief description of your book's content and value

competingBooks.placeholder: Book Marketing Made Easy, APE: Author Publisher Entrepreneur
competingBooks.description: Similar books or ASINs to analyze

targetMarket.label: Target Amazon Market
targetMarket.description: Select the Amazon marketplace for keyword optimization. Each order is for ONE market.

additionalNotes.label: Additional Notes (Optional)
additionalNotes.placeholder: Focus on keywords for Amazon KDP optimization...
additionalNotes.description: Any specific requirements or focus areas

couponCode.description: Enter a coupon code if you have one

review.title: Review Your Order

details.title: Keyword Research Results
details.processing: Your keyword research is being processed. This usually takes 5-10 minutes.
details.failed: Keyword research generation failed. Please contact support.
details.pendingNote: This order is pending payment. You can edit the book details before completing payment.

longTail.title: Long-tail Keywords
longTail.description: Specific 3-5 word phrases with lower competition

kdp.title: Amazon KDP Backend Keywords
kdp.description: Use these keyword sets in your KDP backend (7 boxes, max 50 characters each)

actions.regenerateConfirm: Are you sure you want to regenerate this keyword research? This will create new AI-generated keywords.
